title: My alarm clock in my pixle 3 turned off automatically witout any sound
content: I didnt woke up 2 days in a row, at first I thought it was because some sound setting, so I make sure everything is working,  doday I tried to set up an alarm for a minute away, and I watched the alarm screen, and it just turned itself off without any sound. In addition I set the alarm as application under the not optimized apps for the battery use.
